experiment
Class BasicJNDCondition

java.lang.Object
  experiment.BasicJNDCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition
public class BasicJNDCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Condition

Runs a basic JND condition.

This will assume that all L and R trials are supposed to be randomised and not dictated by any other means.
